Title: Open golf tournament highlights unifying power of sports – Ekşi
Summary: Chief Executive Officer, Turkish Airlines, Bilal Ekşi underscored the power of sports to unite and promote togetherness . Turkish Airlines signed a new three-year title sponsorship for the prestigious Turkish Airlines .

Title: Expert calls for digital innovation, SaaS adoption  to transform Nigeria’s  energy sector
Summary: Expert calls for investment in digital innovation, SaaS adoption  to transform Nigeria’s energy sector . Country Sales Director, Process Automation & Software, English-speaking Africa at Schneider Electric, Elijah Daniel, has stressed the need for investment .

Title: Impeachment move: Power games and a pregnant suspense in Rivers
Summary: The sudden U-turn by four members of the Rivers State House of Assembly, who only days earlier had appealed for dialogue between Governor Siminalayi Fubara and the legislature but have now aligned with calls for the governor’s impeachment .

Title: Why women must audit their inner narratives to unlock real wealth
Summary: In the discourse of Women’s Economic Empowerment, we have long prioritised "Assets" over "Agency" We have operated under the assumption that if we provide the capital and the skills, wealth will inevitably follow .

Title: Undermining other women’s success is fear dressed up in good manners
Summary: Women are anything but one-dimensional, and though sometimes caught in the tumultuous currents of financial challenges and personal journeys, we aspire for more . Women aspire to more, whether in our careers, relationships, or personal growth .

Title: 2027: Getting Tinubu out of power only way to rescue Nigeria  —  ADC
Summary: The ADC claimed Nigeria has been hijacked by individuals with a bandit mentality . The ADC said this attitude reflects the current government's approach to the country .

Title: Coalition: Tinubu a strategic leader; only God can remove him in 2027 — Prophet Sam Ojo
Summary: The outcome of the 2027 general elections ultimately lies in the hands of God . The General Overseer of Freedom Apostolic Revival International Ministry, Prophet Samuel Adebayo Ojo, has described President Bola Ahmed Tinubu as a strategic leader .

Title: Operation Weti e in retrospect
Summary: History, it has been said, is a reflection seen through the eyes of others into events of the past . The world rotates around its history .

Title: Budgets: FG spends N38.2bn on Gowon, Obasanjo, IBB, others in 22 years
Summary: By the end of this year, the Federal Government would have spent, at least, N38.188 billion on the up-keep of former presidents, vice presidents and their families .

Summary: ABBA Abubakar did not look like a man making a routine political announcement . Defection of Atiku's son: Symbolic coup to APC, personal matter to family .

Title: Tinubu laying strong foundation for long-term prosperity — Minister
Summary: The Minister of Information and National Orientation, Alhaji Mohammed Idris, says President Bola Tinubu is laying strong foundation for long-term growth and shared prosperity . Idris stated this when he received members of the Grassroots Advocacy for Tinuba (GAT) 2027 on a courtesy visit .

Title: Life and times of ACF Fiorentina owner Rocco Commisso
Summary: ACF Fiorentina president Rocco Commisso has died at the age of 76 . He was the founder of cable television giant Mediacom and owner of Italian Serie A club ACF . The Italian club said he passed away “after a prolonged period of medical treatment.”

Title: ACF Fiorentina president Rocco Commisso dies at 76
Summary: ACF Fiorentina president, Rocco Commisso, has died at the age of 76 after a prolonged period of medical treatment, the Italian club announced in the early hours of Saturday . The club sad the American-Italian businessman took over the club seven years ago, during which time he became closely identified with the club,

Title: Sokoto holds special prayer for peace, unity
Summary: The prayers were held for Nigeria’s peace, unity and national security . The event is part of broader efforts to foster the nation's progress . It was held in honour of the victims of the kidnapping of three people .
